name: F Minus 1 (automatonvx)
description:
Futuristic Racing in a tribute to F-Zero and MarioKart. 

All Code, Art, Music etc. Made in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare 47.

Instructions

Left Mouse or left CTRL or Z or M to accelerate, Right Click or ALT or X or M to break/reverse. A, D or Left/Right Arrow to steer.
Also supports gamepad (at least XBox controller is all I tested)

You have limited Health and lose it by crashing into walls, if it all goes, its game over man.

If the web version doesn't work well for you try the platform specific builds.

Update - v1.01 Bug fix if returned to Main screen after playing and chose another course game would break. Added Web Version added alternative input keys that don't conflict with browser shortcuts
